name: Mutant Monster Invasion
description:
The fairy tale world has been invaded, and various monsters from other worlds have suddenly appeared in their homes, seeking to absorb the power of the magic crystal.

In various types of levels, players need to carefully observe the path of monsters, use resources reasonably, and build turrets to defend against them. At the same time, they can use various powerful magic to inflict large-scale damage on the enemy and protect the magic power of the crystal from being absorbed by monsters!
